name: Climbing Your Dream
description:
This is my submission to the Platformer Week 1 Jam. It is about a person who is trapped in their own dream and must literally climb out. It is quite difficult. And there are a few light bugs.

The game was made with speedrunning in mind, and it has a speed running clock. So, if you want, let me know what you time was :). The time does not save, so be sure to remember it once you reach to

I think the fastest you can beat the game in is 1:20.

My fastest is 1:27.

for the keyboard, wasd is move, space is jump, and m is dash.
